official_title: Resolved, by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), that the clerk of the House of Representatives in the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 15074) to regulate certain political campaign finance practices.

summary.text: Authorizes the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 15074, to regulate certain political campaign finance practices.

titles.title: Resolved, by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), that the clerk of the House of Representatives in the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 15074) to regulate certain political campaign finance practices.
